title: Quiet 2bdr with Skyline View, AVL 8/5, S303
posting_body: A small, 13-unit building, located in a quiet neighborhood, an easy walk to Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, BART, and downtown Oakland.
This building has brightly-lit corridors, laundry room with new machines, and secure underground parking.

Apartments feature new carpet or hardwood and tile floors, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, new windows, renovated bathrooms, extra insulation for sound and temperature control, energy-efficient lighting, and private balcony.

Security and safety features include seismic strengthening, front-door access control with telephone dial pad entry, video surveillance system, enhanced exterior security lighting, and a centrally-monitored fire alarm.
Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)
Pet: $75 added to the base month per pet
Water and garbage are passed through based on occupancy and usage.
Attached garage parking is available for an additional monthly rent.
Smoking is not permitted on the premises.
